details.description: Do you want to use your data more effectively to gain a competitive edge? Do you want to create new opportunities with data, but are not sure how? Maybe you have a pile of data, and don’t know what to do with it?
details.content:
Do you want to use your data more effectively to gain a competitive edge? Do you want to create new opportunities with data, but are not sure how? Maybe you have a pile of data, and don’t know what to do with it?

Your organisation could be doing more with data to create new opportunities, products or services, and gain a competitive edge among businesses that are increasingly data-driven.

The Open Data Institute, founded by web inventor Sir Tim Berners-Lee and AI expert Sir Nigel Shadbolt, has actively reached 1.88 million people worldwide, trained 3,600 people in open data and unlocked over £44m in investments, contracts, sales and efficiencies globally.

Here’s how we can help you

The ODI will give you practical advice and support to use data more effectively, in order to:

  • make you more efficient
  • save money
  • create new products and services
  • build strong data infrastructure

Let’s have a chat about how we could do that for you by calling 020 3598 9395 or emailing bizdev@theodi.org. After our chat, we’ll pull in our diverse team of consultants, leading technical experts, trainers and policy specialists to co-design a project with you.

Great examples of this work include our recent collaborations with Arup, Thomson Reuters, Syngenta, Sainsbury’s and Deutsche Bank.

Because we’re a non-profit, non-partisan organisation, we’ll give you honest advice and ensure we’re the right fit for each other before starting our relationship.

Get in touch

Because every company is different, and has its own challenges, call us for a meeting to discuss your own unique needs.

Get in touch by emailing us at bizdev@theodi.org

Get in touch
